document_data.caption: A map showing the River Chun in the Black Jungles.
document_data.name: River Chun
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Chun''' was a small waterway found deep in the [[Black Jungles]] of [[Tashalar]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]] of [[southwest Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Geography: The river originated near the heart of the Black Jungles, flowing south down the center of the jungles for {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} before emptying into the [[Great Sea]] in an unnamed bay.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Yuan-ti]] from [[House Jennestas]] patrolled the banks of the River Chun.
